General.Name: Pungguk Ethanol Industrial Co. Ltd
General.Description: Pungguk Ethanol Co., Ltd engages in the manufacture and distribution of ethanol primarily for the liquor industry in South Korea. Its ethanol is also used for various applications, such as food and condiment, extract, medicine, tinctures, cosmetics, tobacco fermentation, gunpowder, detergent, solvent, coagulant, test and research, reagent, feed, fuel, food preservative and disinfection, and others. The company also manufactures and distributes dried distiller grain that is used as a raw material for mixing of feed for stockbreeding. Pungguk Ethanol Co., Ltd was founded in 1953 and is based in Daegu, South Korea.
